title: Process a Toll Reimbursement
description: A driver paid for a toll during a trip. The cost of the toll must be reimbursed to the driver and charged to the rider.

tasks.description: The system detects from the trip's GPS data that the driver passed through a known toll location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically identifies that a toll was likely paid.

tasks.description: The system looks up the correct toll amount for that location and time of day.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct toll cost is retrieved.

tasks.description: The system automatically adds the toll amount to the rider's final fare.
The system adds the toll amount to the driver's earnings for that trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is correctly reimbursed for the toll.
